name: plt.plot()
describe: Plots lines and/or markers to the axes.

name: plt.scatter()
describe: Plots scattered data points.

name: plt.bar()
describe: Plots vertical bar graphs.

name: plt.barh()
describe: Plots horizontal bar graphs.

name: plt.hist()
describe: Plots a histogram.

name: plt.boxplot()
describe: Plots a box-and-whisker plot.

name: plt.pie()
describe: Plots a pie chart.

name: plt.contour()
describe: Plots contours.

name: plt.imshow()
describe: Plots an image.

name: plt.quiver()
describe: Plots a 2D field of arrows.

name: plt.errorbar()
describe: Plots error bars.

name: plt.stem()
describe: Plots vertical lines from a baseline to the y-coordinate.

name: plt.step()
describe: Plots a step plot.

name: plt.fill_between()
describe: Fills the area between two lines.

name: plt.xlabel()
describe: Sets the label for the x-axis.

name: plt.ylabel()
describe: Sets the label for the y-axis.

name: plt.title()
describe: Sets the title of the plot.

name: plt.legend()
describe: Adds a legend to the plot.

name: plt.grid()
describe: Configures the grid lines.

name: plt.xlim()
describe: Sets the x-limits of the current axes.

name: plt.ylim()
describe: Sets the y-limits of the current axes.

name: plt.xticks()
describe: Sets the x-tick locations and labels.

name: plt.yticks()
describe: Sets the y-tick locations and labels.

name: plt.subplots()
describe: Creates a figure and a set of subplots.

name: plt.subplot()
describe: Adds a subplot to the current figure.

name: plt.figure()
describe: Creates a new figure.

name: plt.close()
describe: Closes a figure window.

name: plt.savefig()
describe: Saves the current figure.

name: plt.show()
describe: Displays all open figures.

name: plt.axes()
describe: Adds an axes to the current figure.

name: plt.plot_date()
describe: Plots data that contains dates.

name: plt.axhline()
describe: Adds a horizontal line across the axes.

name: plt.axvline()
describe: Adds a vertical line across the axes.

name: plt.axhspan()
describe: Adds a horizontal span (rectangle) across the axes.

name: plt.axvspan()
describe: Adds a vertical span (rectangle) across the axes.

name: plt.text()
describe: Adds text to the axes.

name: plt.annotate()
describe: Adds an annotation to the axes.

name: plt.arrow()
describe: Adds an arrow to the axes.

name: plt.hist2d()
describe: Plots a 2D histogram.

name: plt.hexbin()
describe: Plots a hexagonal binning plot.

name: plt.pcolormesh()
describe: Plots a pseudocolor plot of a 2D array.

name: plt.streamplot()
describe: Plots streamlines of a vector flow.

name: plt.tricontour()
describe: Plots contours on an unstructured triangular grid.

name: plt.tricontourf()
describe: Plots filled contours on an unstructured triangular grid.

name: plt.tripcolor()
describe: Plots a pseudocolor plot on an unstructured triangular grid.

name: plt.triplot()
describe: Plots a unstructured triangular grid as lines and/or markers.

name: plt.violinplot()
describe: Plots a violin plot.

name: plt.eventplot()
describe: Plots identical parallel lines at specific positions.

name: plt.scatter_matrix()
describe: Plots a matrix of scatter plots.

name: plt.table()
describe: Adds a table to the current axes.
